abstract: With an average audience of 19.1 million viewers, ABC’s 90-minute installment of “Dancing With the Stars” on Monday lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings for the night.
snippet: With an average audience of 19.1 million viewers, ABC’s 90-minute installment of “Dancing With the Stars” on Monday lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings for the night.
lead_paragraph: With an average audience of 19.1 million viewers, ABC’s 90-minute installment of “Dancing With the Stars” on Monday lifted the network to No. 1 in the ratings for the night, according to Nielsen’s estimates. But aside from ABC’s viewership advantage from 8 to 9:30 p.m., the ratings race was close on the night.

headline.main: Ratings: ‘Dancing’ Lifts ABC Into First Place
